verses.verse: Now <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> <S%H7760>laid<s%> a <S%H4522>tribute<s%> on the <S%H776>land<s%> and on the <S%H339>coastlands<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>accomplishments<s%> of his <S%H8633>authority<s%> and <S%H1369>strength,<s%> and the <S%H6575>full<s%> <S%H6575>account<s%> of the <S%H1420>greatness<s%> of <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> to <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1431>advanced<s%> him, are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>Book<s%> of the <S%H1697>Chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>Kings<s%> of <S%H4074>Media<s%> and <S%H6539>Persia<s%>?

For <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> the <S%H3064>Jew<s%> was <S%H4932>second<s%> [only] to <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> among the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> and in <S%H7521>favor<s%> with the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H251>kinsmen,<s%> one who <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H9185>good<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%> and one who <S%H1696>spoke<s%> for the <S%H7965>welfare<s%> of his <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H2233>nation.<s%>
